item.title: Emotes? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“shadytheone, post:2, topic:377736”]Some animation glitch your client/server.

Try getting a emote list download pack.[/quote]

You don’t have the animations configured onto your client. You know you need to add them client-sided right? Or your using the wrong emotes.

Why are you using

0x###? Just get the proper emote Ids?

Read full topic

item.title: Emotes? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

Hi, i added the emote interface with the pictures, and I clicked on it and checked that case, and changed it to make it work with the new interface, some work, but some crash my client.

Here’s my code:

[code]case 168:
// cheer emote
c.setAnimation(0x35E);
break;
case 169:
// beckon emote
c.setAnimation(0x360);
break;

		case 162:
			// no emote
				c.setAnimation(0x358);
			break;

		case 164:
			// angry emote
				c.setAnimation(0x35B);
			break;

		case 165:
			// think emote
				c.setAnimation(0x359);
			break;

		case 161:
			// yes emote
				c.setAnimation(0x357);
			break;

		case 170:
			// laugh emote
				c.setAnimation(0x35D);
			break;

		case 171:
			// Jump for Joy emote
				c.setAnimation(0x83D);
			break;

		case 163:
			// bow emote
				c.setAnimation(0x35A);
			break;

		case 167:
			// shrug emote
				c.setAnimation(0x841);
			break;

		case 172:
			// yawn emote
				c.setAnimation(0x83F);
			break;

		case 166:
			// wave emote
				c.setAnimation(0x35F);
			break;
		case 178:
			// cry emote
				c.setAnimation(0x35C);
		case 179:
			// blow kiss emote
				c.setAnimation(0x558);
		case 180:
			// panic emote
				c.setAnimation(0x839);
		case 181:
			// raspberry emote
				c.setAnimation(0x83E);
		case 182:
			// clap emote
				c.setAnimation(0x361);
		case 183:
			// salute emote
				c.setAnimation(0x840);
		case 184:
			// goblin dance emote
				c.setAnimation(0x850);
		case 186:
			// goblin salute emote
				c.setAnimation(0x84F);
		case 174:
			// dance emote
				c.setAnimation(0x362);
		case 175:
			// jig emote
				c.setAnimation(0x83A);
		case 176:
			// spin emote
				c.setAnimation(0x83B);
		case 177:
			// headbang emote
				c.setAnimation(0x83C);
		case 52050:
			// glassbox emote
				c.setAnimation(0x46B);
		case 52052:
			// climb rope emote
				c.setAnimation(0x46A);
		case 52054:
			// lean emote
				c.setAnimation(0x469);
		case 52056:
			// glass wall emote
				c.setAnimation(0x468);
		case 52058:
			// zombie walk emote
				c.setAnimation();
		case 52060:
			// zombie dance emote
				c.setAnimation();
		case 52062:
			// scared emote
				c.setAnimation();
		case 52064:
			// bunnyhop emote
				c.setAnimation();

[/code]

     case 174:
			// dance emote
				c.setAnimation(0x362);
		case 175:
			// jig emote
				c.setAnimation(0x38A);
		case 176:
			// spin emote
				c.setAnimation(0x38B);
		case 177:
			// headbang emote
				c.setAnimation(0x83C);              these four emotes make me crash

                    case 52058:
			// zombie walk emote
				c.setAnimation();
		case 52060:
			// zombie dance emote
				c.setAnimation();
		case 52062:
			// scared emote
				c.setAnimation();
		case 52064:
			// bunnyhop emote
				c.setAnimation();       I don't have these emote codes

                    case 178:
			// cry emote
				c.setAnimation(0x35C);         This also crashes me.

If anybody has the emotes with picture interface and it fully added can I have your code?
